question: Trade of which among the following commodities faced a worst shortage in Japan because of the radiation leaking from the crippled Fukushima Dai-Ichi power station?
explanation: Trade of Green tea faced a worst shortage in Japan because of the radiation leaking from the crippled Fukushima Dai-Ichi power station. The Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster was a nuclear accident which is more severe nuclear accident since the 1986 Chernobyl disaster.
